page.title: 04My House.
page.content: I live in a semi_detached house in a residential area.My house has seven rooms we have a bathroom and three bedrooms.Downstairs there is a front room where we watch television and sit comfortably on easy chairs.We also have a video recorder which means we can watch programmes when we like.At the back is the dining room where we eat most of our meals.It has a table and four chairs, a sideboard,a bookcase,a piano and a budgie cage.I practice the piano in this room to give the others some peace.The kitchen has an electric cooker, a fridge-freezer,a wash boiler and tumble drier. The back garden has a big lawn with two sheds and a patio. The front garden is mostly gravel where we park our car.
